review.title: “Friendly, fun, productive environment. They do a great job hiring people who work well together.”
review.pros: Pros – The office environment is great. They do a great job hiring like personalities. They have an office keg and shuffle board. Very work hard, play hard atmosphere and mentality.
review.cons: Cons – Limited upward mobility in the company depending on the department.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
